0.description:
One of out Core Spacing Tokens. This value is in px and is generated from the key and the numbers.baseUnit.

key * numbers.baseUnit = value

1.description:
One of out Core Spacing Tokens. This value is in px and is generated from the key and the numbers.baseUnit.

key * numbers.baseUnit = value

px.description: One of out Core Spacing Tokens. This value represents a single pixel and should always equal 1px.

1,5.description:
One of out Core Spacing Tokens. This value is in px and is generated from the key and the numbers.baseUnit.

key * numbers.baseUnit = value

0.description: The 0 margin token. Margin tokens are used to create margin utility classes that reference spacing custom properties.

1.description: The 1 margin token. Margin tokens are used to create margin utility classes that reference spacing custom properties.

-1.description: The margin token represents the negative value of 1 margin token. Margin tokens are used to create margin utility classes that reference spacing custom properties.

px.description: The px margin token. Margin tokens are used to create margin utility classes that reference spacing custom properties.

-3,5.description: The margin token represents the negative value of 3,5 margin token. Margin tokens are used to create margin utility classes that reference spacing custom properties.

3,5.description: The margin token represents the negative value of 3,5 margin token. Margin tokens are used to create margin utility classes that reference spacing custom properties.

auto.description: The auto margin token. Margin tokens are used to create margin utility classes that reference spacing custom properties.
